meanings.definition: A plane figure with four equal straight sides and four right angles.
meanings.sent1: I drew a square on my paper for the art project.
meanings.sent2: The tile floor was made up of many small squares.
meanings.sent3: The chef tried to make a square pancake, but it ended up looking like a circle.
meanings.sent4: Her face lit up with a smile as bright as a perfectly drawn square.
meanings.sent5: The square shape of the window made the room feel cozy and inviting.

meanings.definition: An open, typically four-sided area surrounded by buildings in a city or town.
meanings.sent1: The town square was bustling with people enjoying the sunny day.
meanings.sent2: We sat on a bench in the middle of the square and watched the pigeons.
meanings.sent3: The square was transformed into an ice rink for the winter festival.
meanings.sent4: The square echoed with the sounds of street performers and laughter.
meanings.sent5: The lights of the square twinkled like stars in the night sky.

meanings.definition: A tool used for measuring right angles.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used a square to ensure the corners were perfect.
meanings.sent2: I borrowed a square from the toolbox to help with my geometry homework.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked the square off the table and it rolled away.
meanings.sent4: The old square had markings from years of use, telling stories of past projects.
meanings.sent5: The shiny new square gleamed in the sunlight, ready for precise measurements.

meanings.definition: To make something square in shape or position.
meanings.sent1: He tried to square the picture frame on the wall, but it kept tilting.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter needed to square the edges of the wooden block before gluing them together.
meanings.sent3: She asked him to square the tablecloth on the table before setting the dishes.
meanings.sent4: The gardener worked hard to square the flower bed into a perfect shape.
meanings.sent5: The architect had to square the building's foundation to ensure stability.

meanings.sent1: She appreciated his square answer to her question.
meanings.sent2: The square businessman never cut corners in his dealings.
meanings.sent3: His square explanation left no room for confusion.
meanings.sent4: The square advice he gave was exactly what she needed to hear.
meanings.sent5: His square demeanor made him a trusted friend to all who knew him.
